title: Trump Organization sells 'Trump 2028' hats
shortDescription: The Trump Organization is selling "Trump 2028" hats as the president keeps pushing the idea of running for an unconstitutional third term.

title: What we know now about Trump's impact on education
shortDescription: Education, especially higher education, has been a major focus of President Trump's term. Here is what we know now about his changes to education.

title: NEH hiring Trump’s ‘Garden of Heroes’ artists after cancelling grants
shortDescription: National Endowment for the Humanities union says Trump is using the agency "as a propaganda pipeline."

title: From Trump to Reagan: Their first 100 days
shortDescription: As the Trump administration is set to cross the 100-day mark, here's a look at how we came to judge new presidents.

title: Fort McCoy commander disciplined after missing Trump, Hegseth portraits
shortDescription: The leader of Fort McCoy base in Wisconsin was suspended after backlash for not displaying portraits of President Trump and Defense Secretary Hegseth.

title: Trump order puts civil rights protections at risk, activists say
shortDescription: The landmark 1964 Civil Rights Act aimed to prevent workplace discrimination. Trump says it promotes bias and will stop enforcing it.

title: 'Trump 2028' hats now on sale at official Trump store
shortDescription: The Trump Organization on Thursday began selling "Trump 2028" hats as President Donald Trump said he's "not joking" about running for a third term.

title: Judge partly blocks Trump order seeking to overhaul US elections
shortDescription: The Trump administration cannot enforce parts of an EO requiring US election officials to assess if people who are registering to vote are citizens.

title: Trump targets Democratic fundraising platform ActBlue
shortDescription: The White House is pointing to ActBlue as potentially violating prohibitions on foreign donations in U.S. elections.

title: Federal judge bars Trump from punishing schools over DEI
shortDescription: A federal judge in New Hampshire barred the Education Department from pulling federal funds from schools that don’t eliminate DEI programs.

title: Trump: 'Baby bonus' payments to moms 'sounds like a good idea'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said giving baby bonuses to U.S. mothers after delivering a child "sounds like a good idea."

title: Pres. Trump signs new order on DEI at schools
shortDescription: President Trump signed two new executive orders related to education and diversity.

title: How President Trump's recent executive order impacts HBCUs
shortDescription: The largely symbolic order rehouses a bipartisan presidential initiative on HBCUs at the White House, rather than the Education Department.

title: Melania Trump, a rare Catholic FLOTUS, said she'd 'never forget' meeting pope
shortDescription: The world learned Melania Trump was Catholic when she brought rosary beads for Pope Francis to bless in 2017. Now, she's headed back to the Vatican.

title: Judge: Trump can't withhold funds from 16 'sanctuary' cities, counties
shortDescription: A US judge blocked the Trump administration from withholding federal funding from 'sanctuary' jurisdictions that aren't working with the president.

title: Trump Organization axes top attorney over also representing Harvard
shortDescription: President Trump's company, the Trump Organization, has parted ways with Bill Burck, a prominent attorney who also represents Harvard University.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to allow ban on transgender troops
shortDescription: Two federal district judges have said the Trump administration hasn't supported its claim that transgender troops hurt military readiness.

title: 'Vladimir, STOP!' Trump chides Putin for attack on Ukraine
shortDescription: President Trump offered rare criticism of Russia's Vladimir Putin following a deadly barrage of attacks on Ukraine’s capital Kyiv.

title: Trump to visit Michigan on April 29 to celebrate 100-day mark
shortDescription: Trump is making his first visit back to Michigan in his second, nonconsecutive term in office.

title: Americans sour on Trump's handling of the economy, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
shortDescription: Americans elected Trump in hopes that he would fight inflation and boost the U.S. economy, but they are giving him poor marks for both, a new poll shows.

title: Trump's latest orders address HBCUs, school discipline, foreign gifts
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued seven orders on April 23, calling for changes related to AI, HBCUs, school discipline, foreign gifts and accreditation.

title: 12 Democratic states sue Trump over international tariffs
shortDescription: President Trump argues his tough tariff approach is forcing countries to renegotiate their trade deals with the United States.
